```{r}
is_interval_scaled <- function(x, nunique = 5){
  x <- na.omit(x)
  x <- suppressWarnings(as.numeric(x))
  if(anyNA(x))return(FALSE)
  if(length(unique(x)) < nunique)return(FALSE)
  else return(TRUE)
}
```

```{r predictors}
```

```{r}
map(predictors[-1], ~ggplot(data, aes(x = !!sym(.x), color = Berufsgruppe)) +
      geom_density() +
      facet_wrap(~Berufsgruppe)) %>%
  walk(plot)
```

```{r}
map(predictors[-1], ~ggplot(data, aes(!!sym(.x), gesamt, color = Berufsgruppe)) +
```
